thread.title: Funny video: Chris Farley and Tim Meadows play Wrigley security guards
thread.title_full: Funny video: Chris Farley and Tim Meadows play Wrigley security guards - Chicago Tribune

author: Morgan Greene
title: Funny video: Chris Farley and Tim Meadows play Wrigley security guards
text:
In this Second City sketch from "It Was 30 Years Ago Today," the late Chris Farley and Tim Meadows play Wrigley Field security guards who take their jobs very seriously. They're joined by Dave Pasquesi, who plays a worker trying to find a way into the stadium, like most Chicagoans right now.
The sketch, titled "Security," was filmed for a potential comedy pilot in 1989 after the live show.
Nate Herman directed the revue that included ensemble members Joe Liss, Joel Murray, Judith Scott and Holly Wortell, along with Pasquesi, Farley and Meadows.
Fly the W!
